reqs:
Pre-reqs: (Fourth-year standing and at least 80% average in third-year courses and permission of instructor.)
This course may count as a General List technical elective for Mechanical Engineering students. Students must be in fourth year, have a minimum average of 80% in third year, and have the permission of the instructor to enroll. Students wishing to enroll in this course must register through the process outlined at http://wiki.ubc.ca/Course:MECH493.
description: Research project directed by a faculty member in Mechanical Engineeing.
